definition: in the twinkling of an eye/in a flash/to turn one's eyes
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: This flitting cheerfulness was always at the farther extremity of some long vista through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 这种转瞬即逝的欢悦总是出现在森林纵深处。

sentences.english: Tactics matter and the combats will take your breath away.
sentences.chinese: 技巧和战术的运用将只在转瞬之间。

sentences.english: The big question is whether the planet will disappear in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.chinese: 最大的问题在于地球是否会在转瞬之间消失。

sentences.english: Now, it has been already over 20 years ever since the start of the removal tendency.
sentences.chinese: 转瞬间，港商北移发展至今已有20年之久。

sentences.english: Is immortal, even for a moment is fleeting that we love.
sentences.chinese: 不朽的是我们，须臾的是我们转瞬即逝那爱情。

sentences.english: Mother loves me best.’She suddenly smiled, a quick, beautiful smile.
sentences.chinese: 她突然笑了一下，一个转瞬即近逝美丽的微笑。

sentences.english: In the final analysis, most of life's joys are transitory.
sentences.chinese: 归根结底，尘世间的欢乐大多是过眼烟云，转瞬即逝。

sentences.english: But yesterday in a moment's time I was changed.
sentences.chinese: 但在昨天，转瞬间我被改变了。

sentences.english: And our lives are just the fleeting infinitesimal motes.
sentences.chinese: 而我们的生命，不过是转瞬即逝的一星微尘。

sentences.english: The world of finance dwindled suddenly to a 39)speck.
sentences.chinese: 金融世界转瞬间缩成一小斑点。

sentences.english: Qixi immortalizes one moment that is ephemeral and fast fleeting.
sentences.chinese: 七夕使转瞬即逝的短暂的时刻得以永恒。

sentences.english: The broken mirror was reinstated in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.chinese: 转瞬之间破镜子又恢复了原状。

sentences.english: Knowing the life fleeting, she set herself to enjoy if as best as she could .
sentences.chinese: 她知道这种日子转瞬即逝，于是让自已尽情地享受。

sentences.english: As I've seen many times over, the outer symbols of success can all be easily lost.
sentences.chinese: 无数次我看到那成功的外衣转瞬即逝。

sentences.english: Even a fleeting feeling can change the pace of everything.
sentences.chinese: 即使是转瞬即逝的感觉，也可以改变一切事情的步伐。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the water column retractable -chuen, mouth, all reverted to calm.
sentences.chinese: 转瞬间，水柱缩回泉口，一切复归平静。

definition: one instant/very short time/the twinkle of an eye
in the wink of an eye/in a flash
to blink/to wink/in the twinkling of an eye
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
(of passing time) in an instant/(of a sight) in a flash
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
